definitions.definition: A loose sleeveless garment worn over a suit of armor , sometimes colored or embroidered with the wearer's coat of arms .
An overgarment worn over a woman's gown ; a kind of short robe worn over the tunic at the close of the 11th century.

main_definition: ( historical ) A loose sleeveless garment worn over a suit of armor , sometimes colored or embroidered with the wearer's coat of arms .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) An overgarment worn over a woman's gown ; a kind of short robe worn over the tunic at the close of the 11th century.
